_comment: LLM-maintained flow definitions. No matching rules - categorization is semantic.

mticket.name: M-Ticket
mticket.description: Mobile ticket booking for city buses - ticket selection, fare details, activation, QR display. Single-ride tickets purchased via app.

trip-planner.name: Trip Planner
trip-planner.description: Trip planning (both location-based and stop-based entry) - pick from/to, swap, time/date edits, fetch itineraries (including HOP), quick filters/tabs, select itinerary, proceed to trip details/route details.

super-pass.name: Super Pass
super-pass.description: Monthly/weekly passes for city buses - pass selection, passenger details, proof submission, verification, activation. Multi-ride passes.

premium-bus.name: Premium Bus
premium-bus.description: Reserved premium bus booking - route selection, seat selection, slot booking, pre-booking, cancellation. AC/premium bus services.

metro.name: Metro
metro.description: Metro tickets - metro route discovery, fare fetching, booking, payment, validation, receipts. Includes ONDC metro tickets.

ondc-bus.name: ONDC Bus
ondc-bus.description: ONDC bus tickets - booking, payment, validation, receipts for bus tickets purchased via ONDC protocol. Separate from mticket.

instant-ticket.name: Instant Ticket
instant-ticket.description: Instant ticket purchase - quick ticket buying flow with fare details and summary.

quick-pay.name: Quick Pay
quick-pay.description: Wallet-based fare payment on bus - enter amount, wallet deduction, on-bus validation. Pay-as-you-go for regular buses.

card.name: Card
card.description: Physical card operations - Chalo Card linking/recharge, NCMC balance/recharge, card transactions, OCR scanning, tap operations.

bills.name: Bills
bills.description: Bill payments - electricity bills, BEST bills, and other utility payments through the app.

lifecycle.name: App Lifecycle
lifecycle.description: App-level events - app launch, splash screen, force updates, app ratings, app sharing, terms acceptance. Not product-specific.

onboarding.name: Onboarding
onboarding.description: First-time user setup - language selection, city selection, tutorials, location permissions, get started flow.

authentication.name: Authentication
authentication.description: User authentication - login screen, OTP verification, Truecaller, logout, session management. Identity and access.

home.name: Home
home.description: Home screen interactions - tabs, navigation drawer, nearby stops display, home cards, city change. The main app screen.

search.name: Search
search.description: Route and stop search - universal search/picker, route search results, stop selection. Finding routes.

live-tracking.name: Live Tracking
live-tracking.description: Route details and live tracking - ETA display, schedules, live bus positions, favorites, seat availability. Real-time info.

payment.name: Payment
payment.description: Payment processing across all products - checkout screens, UPI, cards, net banking, wallet payment, Razorpay, Juspay, Inai, payment status, success/failure handling.

validation.name: Validation
validation.description: Ticket/pass validation across all products - BLE scanning, QR codes, tap-in/out, conductor validation, punch notifications.

wallet.name: Wallet
wallet.description: Chalo Wallet operations - balance viewing, load money/recharge, transaction history, Quick Pay ticket purchase (ChaloPayV2 & V3), wallet access/KYC, minimum KYC flow, wallet migration. Includes background wallet sync.

history.name: History
history.description: Booking and transaction history - past bookings, receipts, ride feedback, booking cancellation. Historical records. Ticket summary.

help.name: Help
help.description: Help and support - help screens, issue reporting, chat support, SOS functionality.

notifications.name: Notifications
notifications.description: Notifications - push notifications, in-app notifications, FCM, notification interactions, permission management, punch notifications, TITO notifications, Plotline notifications, Airship notifications.

network.name: Network
network.description: Network and connectivity - connection state, socket management, SSL, encryption/decryption, key sync.

ads.name: Ads
ads.description: In-app advertising - native ads, banner ads, ad impressions, clicks, revenue tracking.
